content: confidence hat kknnoott s o k r e v a t i confidence hat needle us size 4 3 5mm and 6 4 mm circular needle 16 40cm yarn color a ghibli by rial filati dk weight 100% merino wool 50g 100m/109yd colorway blu 200 / 1 5 skeins needed for this project color b & c per sempre by rial filati sport weight yarn 100% merino wool 50g - 150m/164yd colorway 700 and 401 / 15g - 45m/49yd each notions stitch marker 6 tapestry needle gauge 23 sts & 27 rounds = 4 10cm colourwork on larger needles water blocked sizes m l to fit an adult approximated finished circumference 52cm notes this hat is knit in the round from brim to crown colorwork abbreviations pattern pm place marker beg beginning k knit sts stitches ssk slip slip knit 1 stitch decreased sm slip marker k2tog knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch decreased sl1 slip 1 stitch psso pass slipped stitch over 1 stitch decreased k1tbl knit 1 through the back loop instructions brim with smaller needles cast on 114 120 sts join in the round being careful not to twist sts pm to mark beg of the round work in 1x1 k1tbl p1 rib for 1 5 4cm confidence hat body switch to larger needles and knit 2 3 round work in colourwork pattern until hat measures 5 75 6 5 from cast-on if you achieved the stated round gauge this will be approximately the following number of colourwork rounds 27 rounds size l knit 2 rounds shape crown to set up for crown decreases *k19 20 pm * repeat until the end of the round work is now separated into 6 sections round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm* repeat until the end of the round 12 sts decrease round 2 knit until the end of the round work rounds 1-2 a total of 8 8 times 18 24 sts size m 18 sts remain work k1 ssk around size l 24 sts remain work k1 sl1-k2tog-psso around next round ssk until the end 6 sts break yarn draw tail through the remaining stitches and pull tight weave in ends and wet block confidence hat contact & support 📲 follow me for more inspiration and updates
